description: 1.5 (L1) Ensure 'Allow the audio sandbox to run' is set to 'Enabled'
info: "This setting controls whether audio processes in Google Chrome run in a sandbox.
NOTE:
Security software setups within your environment might interfere with the sandbox.

The recommended state for this setting is: Enabled (1)

Having audio processes run in a sandbox ensures that if a website misuses audio processes that data may not be manipulated or exfiltrated from the system."
solution:
"To establish the recommended configuration via Group Policy, set the following UI path to Enabled :

Computer Configuration\Policies\Administrative Templates\Google\Google Chrome\Allow the audio sandbox to run
Impact: None - This is the default behavior."
